post.description:
Creates a reusable VM image in the IaaS from the stemcell image. 
It's used later for creating VMs. For example AWS CPI creates an AMI and returns AMI ID.

parameters.name: image_path
parameters.description: path to the stemcell image on a local FS extracted from the stemcell tarball

parameters.name: cloud_properties
parameters.description: cloud properties hash extracted from the stemcell tarball
